I have tryed to run 'Ant version 1.5alpha compiled on August 29 2001' 

My target was defined like this:

---------Ant script ---------
  <target name="runtests">
    <junit fork="yes" printsummary="yes" haltonfailure="yes">
      <classpath>
        <pathelement path="${src.build.dir}"/>
        <pathelement path="${build.classpath}"/>
      </classpath>

      <formatter type="xml" />

      <batchtest todir="${junit.report.path}">
        <fileset dir="${src.dir}"> 
          <include name="${src.package.dir}/**/tests/*.java" /> 
          <exclude name="**/AllTests.java" /> 
        </fileset> 
      </batchtest> 
    </junit> 

    <junitreport todir="${junit.report.path}">
      <fileset dir="${junit.report.path}">
        <include name="TEST-*.xml"/>
      </fileset>
      <report format="frames" todir="${junit.report.path}"/>
    </junitreport>
  </target>
---------Ant script ---------
